abstract: Citigroup said Friday that its second-quarter earnings increased 18 percent from a year ago to $6.23 billion. Revenue grew 20 percent to a record $26.6 billion, lifted by strength in investment banking and international markets.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup said Friday that its second-quarter earnings increased 18 percent from a year ago to $6.23 billion. Revenue grew 20 percent to a record $26.6 billion, lifted by strength in investment banking and international markets.

headline.main: Citi’s Income Rises on Record Deal Advisory Fees
